section.title: Print T/O Forms
section.para: To print Transfer Order Forms, select the "Print T/O Forms" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing or reprinting Transfer Order Forms, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Transfer Order you want to print.
Select the report definition you want to use for the form. By default, the report linked to the system Form definition will be used.
